string-array.name: menu_strings
string-array.item: Get info on current framerate and calculation period

resources.string: The view for the down-scaled preview image
Set color mode to RGB negative
"Are you sure you want to quit VideOSC?"
Fixed framerate. Unchecking this option may improve color recoginition in dark environments yet result in a decreased frame rate.
Normalize output (0.0–1.0, does not apply to sensor values).
Orientation sensor: Rotation in degrees – \'/%1$s/ori\', x, y, z, timestamp, accuracy
Accelerometer: Force in m/s^2 – \'/%1$s/acc\', x, y, z, timestamp, accuracy
Linear acceleration sensor: m/s^2 minus gravity – \'/%1$s/lin_acc\', x, y, z, timestamp, accuracy
Magnetic field sensor: Geomagnetic field in µT – \'/%1$s/mag\', x, y, z, timestamp, accuracy
Gravity sensor: Force of gravity in m/s^2 – \'/%1$s/grav\', x, y, z, timestamp, accuracy
Proximity sensor: Distance from sensor, typically 0, 5 – \'/%1$s/prox\', distance, timestamp, accuracy
Light sensor: Illumination from sensor in lx – \'/%1$s/light\', illumination, timestamp, accuracy
Air pressure sensor: Ambient pressure in hPa or mbar – \'/%1$s/press\', pressure, timestamp, accuracy
The camera failed to open. Possibly you will have to restart the device.

Add number of calls to OSC sending and number of actually sent OSC messages as additional slots to OSC messages: When sending pixel values over OSC some packets may get dropped. Activating this option adds two additional numbers to each OSC message, the absolute number of calls and the number of actually sent messages. As red, green and blue values are sent in separate threads these numbers are counted within each thread
The following settings will not get stored permanently. They will get reset when you restart the app.
